channel.title: open-data on Daniel Antal, CFA
channel.description: Recent content in open-data on Daniel Antal, CFA

item.title: First CEEMID Regional Open Data Release
item.description: In the preparation to make the CEEMID available as an open-source data integration platform and as a source of open data for the European Music Observatory, the first regional dataset was published today.

item.title: Documenting CEEMID For Open Data Use
item.description: The Central European Music Industry Report 2020 was updated with a technical annex that points out to the new wiki documentation website of CEEMID to make our work more accessible for designing the European Music Observatory.

item.title: OpenData
item.description: Market sizing, research and forecasting reports.

item.title: My economic impact package, iotables, has a much updated released on CRAN
item.description: The analytical functions of the package create the usual economic impact analysis, including direct effects, multipliers on gross value added, employment, CO2 or other factors. The package creates a programmatic interface to compare economic impact changes in time, or compare any country with any country in the European Union.

item.title: Creating better national cultural statistics with Eurobarometer datasets and ESSNet-Culture technical recommendations
item.description: You can download the poster presentation here or you can zoom into it with prezi.

item.title: Market size of the re-usable public sector information in Hungary
item.description: A localization of the measuring European Public Sector Information resources for Hungary in the fields of Business information, geographic information, legal information, meteorological information, social data and transport information. Market sizing, service levels, pricing.
